input.sentences: there are thousands of people lining up to attend his funeral .
nearly half of the people are related to him .
these flower wreaths were donated by the city in honor of [male] .
output.sentences: We gathered in a crowded room to celebrate the life of our friend.
Afterward, we marched to the cemetery.
It was hard to walk without tripping on the person in front of you.
The casket was silver and the flowers were arranged around it.
